abilities.name: Fissure
abilities.description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.

abilities.name: Enchant Totem
abilities.description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage on the next attack. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter. Enchant Totem becomes a 900 range ground target ability, causes you to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there. Reduced cast point of Enchant Totem to 0.

abilities.name: Aftershock
abilities.description: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.

abilities.name: Echo Slam
abilities.description: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units. Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units.

heroInfo.name: Sven
heroInfo.bioRoles: Melee - Carry - Disabler - Initiator - Durable - Nuker

abilities.name: Storm Hammer
abilities.description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units.

abilities.name: Great Cleave
abilities.description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.

abilities.name: Warcry
abilities.description: Sven's Warcry heartens his allies for battle, increasing their movement speed and armor. Lasts 8 seconds.

abilities.name: God's Strength
abilities.description: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for 25 seconds. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

heroInfo.name: Tiny
heroInfo.bioRoles: Melee - Carry - Nuker - Pusher - Initiator - Durable - Disabler

abilities.name: Avalanche
abilities.description: Bombards an area with rocks, stunning and damaging enemy land units.

abilities.name: Toss
abilities.description: Grabs the nearest unit in a 275 radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land. If the tossed unit is an enemy, it will take an extra 20% damage. Toss does more damage with each level in Grow.

abilities.name: Craggy Exterior
abilities.description: Causes damage to bounce back on Tiny's attackers. Enemies that attack Tiny from within 300 units have a chance of being stunned.

abilities.name: Grow
abilities.description: Tiny gains craggy mass that increases his power at the cost of his attack speed. Increases Tossed unit damage and improves movement speed. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

heroInfo.name: Kunkka
heroInfo.bioRoles: Melee - Carry - Disabler - Initiator - Durable - Nuker

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.

abilities.name: Tidebringer
abilities.description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.

abilities.name: X Marks the Spot
abilities.description: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds. Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.

abilities.name: Ghostship
abilities.description: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to 50% of all incoming damage.

abilities.name: Return
abilities.description: Returns the marked hero to the X.

abilities.name: Wild Axes
abilities.description: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path. Each axe can hit an enemy once.

abilities.name: Call of the Wild: Hawk
abilities.description: Beastmaster calls forth a watchful Hawk to scout the battlefield. At level 3 and beyond, the hawk can become invisible after being still for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Call of the Wild: Boar
abilities.description: Beastmaster calls a powerful Boar to stalk the battlefield, capable of spitting poison at enemies to slow their movement and attack speed.

abilities.name: Inner Beast
abilities.description: Untaps the inner fury of allies, passively increasing their attack speed.

abilities.name: Primal Roar
abilities.description: Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open, a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

heroInfo.name: Dragon Knight
heroInfo.bioRoles: Melee - Carry - Pusher - Durable - Disabler - Initiator - Nuker

abilities.name: Breathe Fire
abilities.description: Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.

abilities.name: Dragon Tail
abilities.description: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage. When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.

abilities.name: Dragon Blood
abilities.description: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.

abilities.name: Elder Dragon Form
abilities.description: Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons, increasing his speed, and Dragon Tail's range, while granting him new powers. LEVEL 1 Green Dragon - Corrosive Breath: attacks deal 20 poison damage per second for 5 seconds. Works on structures. LEVEL 2 Red Dragon - Splash Attack: attacks damage all enemy units in a 300 radius, with Corrosive Breath added to the primary target. LEVEL 3 Blue Dragon - Frost Breath: slows movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 20 of enemy units in Splash Attack range for 3 seconds, with Corrosive Breath added to the primary target.

abilities.name: Battery Assault
abilities.description: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun.

abilities.name: Power Cogs
abilities.description: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near. Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down. Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.

abilities.name: Rocket Flare
abilities.description: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Hookshot
abilities.description: Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location. If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage. Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Purification
abilities.description: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Repel
abilities.description: Creates a divine barrier around a target unit which grants them Spell Immunity and 100% resistance to Magic Damage.

abilities.name: Degen Aura
abilities.description: Greatly degenerates the movement and attack capabilities of enemy units that stray too near.

abilities.name: Guardian Angel
abilities.description: Omniknight summons a Guardian Angel that grants immunity from physical damage. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter

abilities.name: Inner Vitality
abilities.description: Unlocks the regenerative power of a friendly unit, with healing based upon its primary attribute. If the target is below 40%, it will heal faster. Lasts 16 seconds.

abilities.name: Burning Spear
abilities.description: Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with his regular attack. Multiple attacks will stack additional damage. Each attack drains some of Huskar's health. Lasts 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Berserker's Blood
abilities.description: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed and magic damage resistance based on missing health.

abilities.name: Life Break
abilities.description: Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target within attack range to shatter a percentage of that hero's current health, and slowing them. While leaping, Huskar is Spell Immune. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

heroInfo.name: Alchemist
heroInfo.bioRoles: Melee - Carry - Support - Durable - Disabler - Initiator - Nuker

abilities.name: Acid Spray
abilities.description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take damage per second and have their armor reduced.

abilities.name: Unstable Concoction
abilities.description: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.

abilities.name: Greevil's Greed
abilities.description: Alchemist synthesizes additional gold from his enemies and bounty runes. With each kill, Alchemist earns base bonus gold and extra bonus gold. If Alchemist kills another unit which yields gold within the next 30 seconds, an additional instance of Extra Bonus Gold is added to the total. Additionally, causes bounty runes to yield 3 times their normal gold.

abilities.name: Chemical Rage
abilities.description: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and regeneration.

abilities.name: Unstable Concoction Throw
abilities.description: Throw it before it blows up!

heroInfo.name: Brewmaster
heroInfo.bioRoles: Melee - Carry - Initiator - Durable - Disabler - Nuker

abilities.name: Thunder Clap
abilities.description: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy land units.

abilities.name: Drunken Haze
abilities.description: Drenches a small area in alcohol, causing their movement speed to be reduced, and causing their attacks to have a chance to miss.

abilities.name: Drunken Brawler
abilities.description: Gives a chance to avoid attacks and to deal critical damage. Drunken Brawler will always trigger if you have not attacked, or have not been attacked, in the last several seconds. Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

abilities.name: Primal Split
abilities.description: Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

heroInfo.name: Treant Protector
heroInfo.bioRoles: Melee - Support - Initiator - Durable - Disabler - Escape

abilities.name: Nature's Guise
abilities.description: Causes the targeted unit to blend in with the forest, becoming invisible to enemies and gaining a movement speed bonus when near a tree. If the unit moves away from a tree or the spell is cast on a unit with no nearby trees, Nature's Guise is lost. Treant Protector can cast spells and remain invisible under Nature's Guise.

abilities.name: Leech Seed
abilities.description: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it. Pulses 6 times.

abilities.name: Living Armor
abilities.description: Infuses the target hero or structure with a protective coating which grants bonus regeneration. Also blocks some damage from all sources. Dispels when a number of damage instances are taken.

abilities.name: Eyes In The Forest
abilities.description: Treant Protector enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location. If Overgrowth is cast, units within a 800 radius of an enchanted tree will be entangled and damaged.

abilities.name: Overgrowth
abilities.description: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that prevent afflicted enemies from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Tether
abilities.description: Tethers Io to an allied unit, granting bonus movement speed to both. When Io restores health or mana, tethered units target gain 1.5x the amount. Any enemy unit that crosses the tether is slowed. The tether breaks when the allied unit moves too far away, or Io cancels the tether.

abilities.name: Break Tether
abilities.description: Break the link to the tethered unit.

abilities.name: Spirits
abilities.description: Summon five particle spirits that dance in a circle around Io. If a particle collides with an enemy hero, it explodes, damaging all enemy units in an area around it. Creeps take minor damage from touching a particle spirit, but do not cause them to explode. When its duration ends, any remaining Spirits explode.

abilities.name: Overcharge
abilities.description: Io gains bonus attack speed and damage reduction, at the cost of draining a percentage of its current health and mana per second. If Io is Tethered to an ally, that unit also gains the bonuses.

abilities.name: Relocate
abilities.description: Teleports Io and any tethered ally to any location. After the spell expires Io and any tethered ally will return to their original location. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

abilities.name: Spirits In
abilities.description: Calls the spirits closer to you. Can be toggled on and off.

abilities.name: Spirits Out
abilities.description: Sends the spirits farther away from you. Can be toggled on and off.

heroInfo.name: Centaur Warrunner
heroInfo.bioRoles: Melee - Durable - Initiator - Disabler - Nuker - Escape

abilities.name: Hoof Stomp
abilities.description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Double Edge
abilities.description: Centaur strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target. Centaur cannot die from Double Edge.

abilities.name: Return
abilities.description: Centaur counters every attack, damaging the attacker based on a percentage of Centaur's strength.

abilities.name: Stampede
abilities.description: Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and stop any enemy units they trample. Trampled enemies take damage based on Centaur Warrunner's strength. Each enemy can be trampled once. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Whirling Death
abilities.description: Timbersaw whirls extremely sharp edges, damaging enemies and destroying trees around him in an area. If an enemy hero is affected, it loses some of its primary attribute for a short duration. Whirling Death will deal Pure damage if a tree is cut down in the process.

abilities.name: Timber Chain
abilities.description: Timbersaw fires a chain that embeds itself in the first tree it hits, pulling him towards it. Any enemy in the path takes damage.

abilities.name: Reactive Armor
abilities.description: Each time Timbersaw is attacked, he gains increased health regen and armor.

abilities.name: Chakram
abilities.description: Fires your main saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it. Additionally, for each 5% of health missing, enemies caught in the saw blade move more slowly. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted. While active the ability costs mana, and you lose the ability to attack.

abilities.name: Return Chakram
abilities.description: Returns the Chakram to Timbersaw.

abilities.name: Chakram
abilities.description: Fires your main saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it. Enemies caught in the saw blade will move more slowly for every 5% of health missing. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted. While active the ability costs mana, and you lose the ability to attack. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Return Chakram
abilities.description: Returns the Chakram to Timbersaw.

abilities.name: Viscous Nasal Goo
abilities.description: Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed. Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter, making Goo an AoE ability that applies Goo to all enemies around you in a 700 radius.

abilities.name: Quill Spray
abilities.description: Sprays enemy units with quills dealing damage in an area of effect around Bristleback. Deals bonus damage for every time a unit was hit by Quill Spray in the last 14 seconds.

abilities.name: Bristleback
abilities.description: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear. If Bristleback takes 210 damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.

abilities.name: Warpath
abilities.description: Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Ice Shards
abilities.description: Tusk compresses shards of ice into a ball of frozen energy that damages all enemies it comes in contact with. When the ball reaches its target destination the shards are released, creating a barrier that lasts for 7 seconds.

abilities.name: Snowball
abilities.description: Tusk begins rolling into a snowball. Allies within a 350 radius can also be added to the snowball by right-clicking on them, even while the snowball is moving. Once launched, any enemies caught in the snowball's path will be stunned and take damage. Each allied Hero in the snowball will add to its damage.

abilities.name: Frozen Sigil
abilities.description: Tusk summons a Frozen Sigil by calling upon the deepest cold of winter. The Sigil creates a snowstorm which slows all enemy units within 600 range.

abilities.name: Launch Snowball
abilities.description: Launch the snowball toward the target.

abilities.name: Walrus Kick
abilities.description: Kicks the target unit back 900 units, damaging them and slowing their movement by 40% for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Walrus PUNCH!
abilities.description: Tusk connects with his mighty Walrus Punch, a critical strike so powerful it launches its victim into the air. The victim is slowed upon landing. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Echo Stomp
abilities.description: Elder Titan and his Astral Spirit both stomp the ground, damaging and knocking nearby enemy units unconscious around their locations. The Elder Titan stomp deals physical damage, while the Spirit stomp deals magical damage.

abilities.name: Astral Spirit
abilities.description: Elder Titan sends forth his Astral Spirit, damaging any units it passes through. When the spirit rejoins the Titan, it grants bonus damage and movement speed for each unit it damaged. The Astral Spirit possesses the Echo Stomp, Return Spirit, and Natural Order abilities.

abilities.name: Natural Order
abilities.description: Reduces all elements to their basic levels, removing base armor and magic damage resistance from nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Return Astral Spirit
abilities.description: Returns the Astral Spirit to Elder Titan.

abilities.name: Earth Splitter
abilities.description: Sends forth a jagged crack in front of Elder Titan. After 3 seconds, the crack implodes, slowing movement while dealing damage to each enemy based on their maximum life. Half of the damage dealt is Magical damage, while the other half is Physical damage. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

heroInfo.name: Legion Commander
heroInfo.bioRoles: Melee - Carry - Disabler - Initiator - Durable - Nuker

abilities.name: Overwhelming Odds
abilities.description: Turns the enemies' numbers against them, dealing damage and granting you bonus movement speed per unit or per hero. Deals bonus damage to illusions and summoned units as a percent of their current health.

abilities.name: Press The Attack
abilities.description: Removes debuffs and disables from the target friendly unit, and grants bonus attack speed and health regen for a short time.

abilities.name: Moment of Courage
abilities.description: When attacked, Legion Commander has a chance to immediately counterattack with bonus lifesteal.

abilities.name: Duel
abilities.description: Legion Commander and the target enemy hero are forced to attack each other for a short duration. Neither hero can use items or abilities. If either hero dies during the duration, the hero winning the Duel gains permanent bonus damage. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

heroInfo.name: Earth Spirit
heroInfo.bioRoles: Melee - Nuker - Escape - Disabler - Initiator - Durable

abilities.name: Boulder Smash
abilities.description: Earth Spirit smashes the target enemy or ally, sending them in the direction he is facing. If Earth Spirit targets an area, he will smash the nearest Stone Remnant in a 200 radius. The travelling unit or Remnant damages all enemy units it hits. If an enemy is hit by a Stone Remnant, they are also stunned. Stone Remnants travel further than other units.

abilities.name: Rolling Boulder
abilities.description: Earth Spirit gathers himself into a boulder and, after a 0.6s delay, rolls toward the target location, damaging enemy units. He will stop if he collides with an enemy hero or is stunned. If he rolls over a Stone Remnant, he will travel further and faster, and enemies hit by the boulder will have their movement speed slowed.

abilities.name: Geomagnetic Grip
abilities.description: Earth Spirit pulls the target Stone Remnant. Enemies struck by the gripped target will be silenced, and take damage if the gripped target is a Stone Remnant.

abilities.name: Stone Remnant
abilities.description: Call a Stone Remnant to the target location. Stones Remnants have no vision and are invulnerable, and can be used with Earth Spirit's abilities. Calling a Stone Remnant consumes a charge, which recharge over time.

abilities.name: Enchant Remnant
abilities.description: Earth Spirit temporarily enchants a hero, granting them the properties of a Stone Remnant. After 3 seconds the remnant shatters, releasing the hero and damaging nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Magnetize
abilities.description: Magnetizes units in a small nearby area, causing them to take damage for a short duration. Magnetized heroes cause nearby Stone Remnants to explode, destroying the remnant and refreshing Magnetize's duration on all nearby enemies. This process can repeat multiple times. If an enemy hero is affected by silence or slows as a result of Geomagnetic Grip or Rolling Boulder, all magnetized heroes share the effects. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

heroInfo.name: Phoenix
heroInfo.bioRoles: Ranged - Support - Nuker - Initiator - Escape - Disabler

abilities.name: Icarus Dive
abilities.description: Phoenix dives forward in an arc with a fixed distance in the targeted direction, dealing damage over time and slowing the movement speed of any units it comes into contact with, and then orbiting back to its original position. If Phoenix casts Supernova, the dive ends.

abilities.name: Fire Spirits
abilities.description: Summons 4 fire spirits that circle around Phoenix. Each spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.

abilities.name: Sun Ray
abilities.description: Phoenix expels a beam of light at the cost of its own health. The beam damages enemies and heals allies for a base amount plus a percentage of their health. The percentage increases as the beam continues to fire.

abilities.name: Supernova
abilities.description: The Phoenix willingly ends its current life for the chance to be reborn. Transforms into a burning sun that scorches enemies in a huge area. The sun can be destroyed by attacks from enemy Heroes. After 6 seconds the sun explodes, stunning all nearby enemies while restoring Phoenix to full health and mana with refreshed abilities. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Launch Fire Spirit
abilities.description: Each fire spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced. Reveals the area it strikes for 1 second.

abilities.name: Stop Icarus Dive
abilities.description: Immediately cancels the dive.

abilities.name: Stop Sun Ray
abilities.description: Immediately stops the Sun Ray.

abilities.name: Toggle Movement
abilities.description: Toggles slow forward movement during Sun Ray firing.

abilities.name: Mana Break
abilities.description: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack. Mana Break deals 60% of the mana burned as damage to the target. Mana Break is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.

abilities.name: Spell Shield
abilities.description: Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.

abilities.name: Mana Void
abilities.description: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies. The main target is also mini-stunned.

abilities.name: Frost Arrows
abilities.description: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement. Lasts 1.5 seconds on Heroes, and 7 seconds on creeps. Frost Arrows is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

abilities.name: Gust
abilities.description: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to you.

abilities.name: Precision Aura
abilities.description: Adds bonus damage to the physical attack of allied, ranged Hero units based on a percentage of Drow's agility. Affects creeps for 30 seconds when cast.

abilities.name: Marksmanship
abilities.description: Drow's experiences in battle improve her accuracy and effectiveness in combat, providing a passive bonus to Agility. Grants no bonus if there are enemy heroes within 400 range. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Blade Fury
abilities.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Lasts 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Healing Ward
abilities.description: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health. The Healing Ward moves at 420 movement speed after being summoned. Lasts 25 seconds.

abilities.name: Blade Dance
abilities.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.

abilities.name: Omnislash
abilities.description: Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 200-225 damage per slash. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

heroInfo.name: Mirana
heroInfo.bioRoles: Ranged - Carry - Support - Escape - Nuker - Disabler

abilities.name: Starstorm
abilities.description: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a 425 radius will be struck a second time for 75% of the damage. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter, causing Starstorm to passively trigger every 8 seconds. Does not trigger if the enemy doesn't see Mirana.

abilities.name: Sacred Arrow
abilities.description: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to 5 seconds, with bonus damage up to 140 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.

abilities.name: Leap
abilities.description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering allied units with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Moonlight Shadow
abilities.description: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.

heroInfo.name: Morphling
heroInfo.bioRoles: Ranged - Carry - Escape - Durable - Nuker - Disabler

abilities.name: Waveform
abilities.description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path. Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.

abilities.name: Adaptive Strike
abilities.description: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning the target while dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier. If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum damage and the minimum stun is dealt. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum stun and minimum damage are dealt.

abilities.name: Morph (Agility Gain)
abilities.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible. Additional points in Morph increase the rate of stat change. Passively grants bonus Agility.

abilities.name: Morph (Strength Gain)
abilities.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible. Additional points in Morph increase the rate of stat change. Passively grants bonus Strength.

abilities.name: Hybrid
abilities.description: Morphling creates a hybrid replication of a target allied hero, which can cast all of that hero's current, non-ultimate abilities. Enemies are able to see which unit is a hybrid.

abilities.name: Replicate
abilities.description: Morphling replicates any hero, friend or foe, dealing 80% of the original Hero's outgoing damage while taking 100% of any incoming damage. At any time, Morphling can instantly take the position of the Replicate for 150 mana. If Morphling dies, the Replicate will expire. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Morph Replicate
abilities.description: Morphling switches into his replication, instantly taking its position.

abilities.name: Spirit Lance
abilities.description: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.

abilities.name: Doppelganger
abilities.description: Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After 1 second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes 600% damage and deals 20% damage.

abilities.name: Phantom Rush
abilities.description: When targetting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.

abilities.name: Juxtapose
abilities.description: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for 8 seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last 4 seconds.

heroInfo.name: Vengeful Spirit
heroInfo.bioRoles: Ranged - Support - Initiator - Disabler - Nuker - Escape

abilities.name: Magic Missile
abilities.description: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Wave of Terror
abilities.description: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the armor of enemies and giving vision of the path ahead.

abilities.name: Vengeance Aura
abilities.description: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the physical damage of nearby friendly units. If Vengeful Spirit is slain, her killer will be possessed with a negative Vengeance Aura, reducing the damage of her killer and its nearby allies until Vengeful Spirit revives.

abilities.name: Nether Swap
abilities.description: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy. Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Smoke Screen
abilities.description: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies, and causing them to miss most attacks, as well as slowing movement.

abilities.name: Blink Strike
abilities.description: Teleports behind the target unit, striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.

abilities.name: Cloak and Dagger
abilities.description: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible.

abilities.name: Tricks of the Trade
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Phases out of the world while striking every enemy from behind in a 500 AoE once per second.

abilities.name: Shrapnel
abilities.description: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every 55 seconds.

abilities.name: Headshot
abilities.description: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and briefly stop the movements of his enemies.

abilities.name: Take Aim
abilities.description: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle.

abilities.name: Assassinate
abilities.description: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after 2 seconds, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range, and mini-stuns the target.

abilities.name: Refraction
abilities.description: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage and gaining a bonus to her damage. The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances.

abilities.name: Meld
abilities.description: Templar Assassin conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still. If Meld's invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya will deal bonus damage to the enemy and reduce their armor for 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Psi Blades
abilities.description: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range.

abilities.name: Trap
abilities.description: Springs the nearest trap, slowing nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Psionic Trap
abilities.description: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they exert a slowing influence of 30% in the area. Traps charge up to slow an additional 5% every second, up to 50%.

abilities.name: Lucent Beam
abilities.description: Calls a beam of lunar energy down upon an enemy, damaging and briefly stunning them.

abilities.name: Moon Glaive
abilities.description: Empowers Luna's glaive, causing her attacks to bounce between enemy units. Deals less damage with each bounce.

abilities.name: Lunar Blessing
abilities.description: Increases the damage dealt by attacks from Luna and nearby allied heroes. Luna is also blessed with increased vision range at night.

abilities.name: Eclipse
abilities.description: Showers random nearby enemies with strikes from Luna's current level of Lucent Beam. These beams do not stun their targets, and there is a maximum number of times that a single target can be struck. Also turns day into night for 10 seconds. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Shuriken Toss
abilities.description: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target. The shuriken will bounce between any Tracked units who are within a 1200 radius of each other.

abilities.name: Jinada
abilities.description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.

abilities.name: Shadow Walk
abilities.description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability. If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will deal bonus damage.

abilities.name: Track
abilities.description: Tracks an enemy hero, granting True Sight of the target, and information on how much gold it is carrying. Allies near the hunted are granted bonus movement speed. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bonus bounty of gold.

abilities.name: Earthshock
abilities.description: Ursa slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Overpower
abilities.description: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.

abilities.name: Fury Swipes
abilities.description: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage. If the same target is not attacked after 15 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.

abilities.name: Enrage
abilities.description: Ursa goes into a frenzy, multiplying his Fury Swipes damage and causing him to take 80% less damage. Removes any existing debuffs. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Rocket Barrage
abilities.description: Launches a salvo of rockets at nearby enemy units in a radius around the Gyrocopter. Lasts 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Homing Missile
abilities.description: Fires a homing missile to seek the targeted enemy unit. The missile gains speed over time, dealing damage and stunning when it impacts the target. Homing Missile deals greater damage the further it has traveled. Enemy units can destroy the missile before it reaches its target.

abilities.name: Flak Cannon
abilities.description: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemy units in an area around it for a limited number of attacks. Only the main target of attacks will receive attack bonuses such as Critical Strike. Lasts 15 seconds or until the attacks are used.

abilities.name: Call Down
abilities.description: Call down an aerial missile strike on enemy units in a target area. Two missiles arrive in succession, the first dealing major damage and minor slow for 2 seconds; the second dealing minor damage and major slow for 4 seconds. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Summon Spirit Bear
abilities.description: Summons a powerful Spirit Bear companion that can equip items. If the bear moves 1100 distance away from the Lone Druid, it cannot attack. Lone Druid suffers 10% of his max health as backlash damage if the Spirit Bear dies. As the bear increases in levels, it can learn the Return, Entangling Claws, and Demolish abilities. Spirit Bear does not benefit from attributes. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter, allowing Spirit Bear to attack at any range from Lone Druid, and to survive if Lone Druid dies.

abilities.name: Rabid
abilities.description: Increases the attack and movement speed of Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear.

abilities.name: Savage Roar
abilities.description: Lone Druid roars fiercely causing nearby enemies to flee towards their base in terror. Their movement speed is increased by 20%.

abilities.name: Battle Cry
abilities.description: Adds attack damage and armor to the Lone Druid as well as any nearby units under his control.

abilities.name: True Form
abilities.description: Lone Druid learns to morph himself into a raging bear, losing his ranged advantage and some base movement speed, but gaining melee power as well as the Battle Cry ability. He can morph freely between druid and bear form. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Druid Form
abilities.description: Return to Druid form. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

heroInfo.name: Naga Siren
heroInfo.bioRoles: Melee - Carry - Support - Pusher - Disabler - Initiator - Escape

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.description: Creates three images of Naga Siren under her control.

abilities.name: Ensnare
abilities.description: Interrupts the target and traps them in place, preventing movement or blinking.

abilities.name: Rip Tide
abilities.description: The Naga Siren and her images hit all nearby units with a damaging wave of water that lowers armor for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Song of the Siren
abilities.description: All enemies in range of the Naga Siren are put into a magical stasis where they cannot act or be attacked. Using Song of the Siren again will end the duration early. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Song of the Siren End
abilities.description: Release enemy units from your song so they can be targeted again.

abilities.name: Berserker's Rage
abilities.description: While active, Troll Warlord swaps from using ranged to melee attacks. Melee attacks have a chance to bash, dealing bonus damage and stunning the target. Berserker's Rage also grants additional health, movement speed, armor, and increased attack speed. Whirling Axes has different functionality while Berserker's Rage is active.

abilities.name: Whirling Axes (Ranged)
abilities.description: Troll hurls a fistful of five axes in a cone shape over 900 range, slowing and damaging enemy units.

abilities.name: Whirling Axes (Melee)
abilities.description: Troll hurls two axes around him in a close range area of effect, damaging enemy units and causing them to miss some attacks.

abilities.name: Fervor
abilities.description: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed. If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.

abilities.name: Battle Trance
abilities.description: Troll's presence on the battlefield increases the attack speed of himself and all allied heroes.

heroInfo.name: Ember Spirit
heroInfo.bioRoles: Melee - Carry - Escape - Nuker - Disabler - Initiator

abilities.name: Searing Chains
abilities.description: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.

abilities.name: Sleight of Fist
abilities.description: Ember Spirit dashes around with blazing speed, attacking all enemies in the targeted area of effect, then returning to his start location. Deals bonus damage to heroes, and less damage to creeps.

abilities.name: Flame Guard
abilities.description: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, leaving him unharmed. Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active. If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.

abilities.name: Activate Fire Remnant
abilities.description: Select the Fire Remnant to arrive at.

abilities.name: Fire Remnant
abilities.description: Ember Spirit generates Fire Remnant charges every 35 seconds, with a max of 3 charges. Releasing a charge sends a Fire Remnant that runs to the target location at 2.5x Ember Spirit's speed. Using Activate Fire Remnant, Ember Spirit can dash out to his Remnants, exploding them for area of effect damage. The targeted Remnant will be arrived at last.

abilities.name: Crystal Nova
abilities.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.

abilities.name: Frostbite
abilities.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing 50 damage every half-second. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.

abilities.name: Arcane Aura
abilities.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is increased for Crystal Maiden.

abilities.name: Freezing Field
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Lasts 10 seconds. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Illusory Orb
abilities.description: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.

abilities.name: Waning Rift
abilities.description: Puck releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.

abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.description: Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.

abilities.name: Ethereal Jaunt
abilities.description: Teleports Puck to a flying Illusory Orb.

abilities.name: Dream Coil
abilities.description: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for 0.5 seconds and damaging them. If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

heroInfo.name: Storm Spirit
heroInfo.bioRoles: Ranged - Carry - Escape - Nuker - Initiator - Disabler

abilities.name: Static Remnant
abilities.description: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.

abilities.name: Electric Vortex
abilities.description: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location, it also slows the Storm Spirit by 50% for 3 seconds. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter, causing Electric Vortex to be a 475 AoE ability.

abilities.name: Overload
abilities.description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on his next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Ball Lightning
abilities.description: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is 30+8% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 12+0.7% of his total mana pool. Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.

heroInfo.name: Windranger
heroInfo.bioRoles: Ranged - Carry - Support - Disabler - Escape - Nuker

abilities.name: Shackleshot
abilities.description: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it. If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.75.

abilities.name: Powershot
abilities.description: Windranger charges her bow for up to 1 second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies and destroys trees along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced by 10%.

abilities.name: Windrun
abilities.description: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Focus Fire
abilities.description: Windranger channels the wind to gain 500 additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage. Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced. Lasts 20 seconds. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Arc Lightning
abilities.description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Lightning Bolt
abilities.description: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 750 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in 325 range.

abilities.name: Static Field
abilities.description: Zeus shocks all nearby enemy units whenever he casts a spell, causing damage proportional to their current health.

abilities.name: Thundergod's Wrath
abilities.description: Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be. Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck. If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Dragon Slave
abilities.description: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.

abilities.name: Light Strike Array
abilities.description: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.

abilities.name: Fiery Soul
abilities.description: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina casts a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Laguna Blade
abilities.description: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

heroInfo.name: Shadow Shaman
heroInfo.bioRoles: Ranged - Support - Pusher - Disabler - Nuker - Initiator

abilities.name: Ether Shock
abilities.description: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.

abilities.name: Shackles
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, while dealing damage over time.

abilities.name: Mass Serpent Ward
abilities.description: Summons 10 serpent wards to attack enemy units and structures. The wards are immune to magic, and have a small area of splash damage. It takes two hits to destroy a single ward. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Laser
abilities.description: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage and blinding the target, causing it to miss all physical attacks. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter, causing the laser to refract between all visible enemy heroes in a 650 range.

abilities.name: Heat-Seeking Missile
abilities.description: Launches a pair of rockets at the nearest visible enemy heroes within 2500 range. The number of missile targets is doubled with Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: March of the Machines
abilities.description: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.

abilities.name: Rearm
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.

heroInfo.name: Nature's Prophet
heroInfo.bioRoles: Ranged - Carry - Jungler - Pusher - Escape - Nuker

abilities.name: Sprout
abilities.description: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place.

abilities.name: Teleportation
abilities.description: Teleports to any point on the map.

abilities.name: Nature's Call
abilities.description: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have 550 health and deal 30-34 damage.

abilities.name: Wrath of Nature
abilities.description: Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

heroInfo.name: Enchantress
heroInfo.bioRoles: Ranged - Support - Jungler - Pusher - Durable - Disabler

abilities.name: Untouchable
abilities.description: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.

abilities.name: Enchant
abilities.description: Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are slowed. If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control. If cast on a creep already under her control, she refreshes its enchant duration.

abilities.name: Nature's Attendants
abilities.description: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby. Lasts 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Impetus
abilities.description: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is. The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Dual Breath
abilities.description: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.

abilities.name: Ice Path
abilities.description: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.

abilities.name: Liquid Fire
abilities.description: Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks. Liquid Fire is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

abilities.name: Macropyre
abilities.description: Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Penitence
abilities.description: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and take more damage from attacks and spells.

abilities.name: Test of Faith
abilities.description: Deals random damage to test an enemy unit's faith.

abilities.name: Test of Faith
abilities.description: Teleports an allied unit back to the base. Creeps are teleported instantly, while Heroes have a delay before teleporting. If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen through Holy Persuasion will be teleported to him after a delay.

abilities.name: Holy Persuasion
abilities.description: Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep. If the persuaded creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter, allowing Chen to persuade Ancient Creeps. The number of Ancient Creeps that can be persuaded is based on the level of Hand of God.

abilities.name: Hand of God
abilities.description: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

heroInfo.name: Silencer
heroInfo.bioRoles: Ranged - Carry - Support - Disabler - Initiator - Nuker

abilities.name: Arcane Curse
abilities.description: Curses the target area, causing enemy heroes to take damage and slowing their movement speed. Anytime affected enemies cast a spell, the duration is increased.

abilities.name: Glaives of Wisdom
abilities.description: Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence.

abilities.name: Last Word
abilities.description: Enchants a target, causing them to be damaged and silenced if they cast a spell or if the enchantment timer expires.

abilities.name: Global Silence
abilities.description: Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

heroInfo.name: Ogre Magi
heroInfo.bioRoles: Melee - Support - Nuker - Disabler - Durable - Initiator

abilities.name: Fireblast
abilities.description: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.

abilities.name: Ignite
abilities.description: Drenches a target in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.

abilities.name: Bloodlust
abilities.description: Incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed. Can be cast on towers.

abilities.name: Unrefined Fireblast
abilities.description: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target. Its mana cost is 60% of the hero's current mana.

abilities.name: Multicast
abilities.description: Enables Ogre Magi to cast his spells multiple times with each use, while also granting his spells greater potency: Fireblast has its cooldown decreased, its range increased, and its mana cost increased. Ignite hits enemies in an area, its range is increased, and it may be cast onto random nearby enemies when used. Bloodlust has its cooldown reduced, and may be cast on random nearby allies when used. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Telekinesis
abilities.description: Rubick uses his telekinetic powers to lift the enemy into the air briefly and then hurls them back at the ground. The unit lands on the ground with such force that it stuns nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Telekinesis Land
abilities.description: Chooses the location the target will land when Telekinesis finishes.

abilities.name: Fade Bolt
abilities.description: Rubick creates a powerful stream of arcane energy that travels between enemy units, dealing damage and reducing their attack damage. Each jump deals less damage.

abilities.name: Null Field
abilities.description: Rubick's mastery of the arcane protects nearby allies against weaker magics, granting them magic resistance.

abilities.name: Spell Steal
abilities.description: Rubick studies the trace magical essence of one enemy hero, learning the secrets of the last spell the hero cast. Rubick can use this spell as his own for several minutes or until he dies. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Thunder Strike
abilities.description: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning. Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius. Provides vision of its target.

abilities.name: Glimpse
abilities.description: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago. Instantly kills illusions.

abilities.name: Kinetic Field
abilities.description: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.

abilities.name: Static Storm
abilities.description: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration. The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.description: Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled. Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path. The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter, allowing Illuminate to heal allies and harm enemies during daytime. The heal and damage amounts are the same.

abilities.name: Mana Leak
abilities.description: Weakens an enemy's magical essence, causing them to lose mana as they move. If the enemy loses all of its mana, it will be stunned.

abilities.name: Chakra Magic
abilities.description: Restores mana to the target unit, increases its mana capacity, and reduces the cooldown of the next spell they cast.

abilities.name: Recall
abilities.description: After a short delay, teleports the targeted friendly hero to your location. If the targeted friendly hero takes player based damage during this time, the ability is interrupted.
abilities.abilityDetails: ABILITY: No Target, Channeled, Unit Target, Point Target

abilities.name: Blinding Light
abilities.description: A blinding light flashes over the targeted area, knocking back and blinding the units in the area, causing them to miss attacks.

abilities.name: Spirit Form
abilities.description: Ezalor temporarily turns his body luminescent, gaining various abilities. Illuminate is now channeled by a separate spirit, and gains the Blinding Light and Recall abilities. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Release Illuminate
abilities.description: Release the channel early.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.description: Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled. Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path. The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter, allowing Illuminate to heal allies and harm enemies during daytime. The heal and damage amounts are the same.

abilities.name: Arcane Bolt
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on Skywrath Mage's intelligence.

abilities.name: Concussive Shot
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage sets off a long range shot that hits the closest hero within a long range. Upon impact, it deals damage and slows in an area of effect.

abilities.name: Ancient Seal
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage seals the targeted unit with an ancient rune, silencing it and causing it to take additional damage from spells.

abilities.name: Mystic Flare
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage uses his ultimate magical ability to conjure a precise and violent mystical field that lays waste to his adversaries. Deals massive damage distributed evenly among any Heroes in the area over 2.4 seconds. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Fortune's End
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Gathers Oracle's power into a bolt of scouring energy that, when released, damages, stops movement, and purges enemies of buffs in an area around the target. If target is an ally it will only purge. Can be channeled for up to 2.5 seconds. The stop duration is equal to the time spent channeling.

abilities.name: Fate's Edict
abilities.description: Oracle enraptures a target, disarming them and granting them 100% magic damage resistance. Can be cast on allies and enemies.

abilities.name: Purifying Flames
abilities.description: Burns away impurities, dealing heavy magic damage to the target before causing them to regenerate health over time. The amount of health regenerated over its duration exceeds the amount of initial damage. Can be cast on enemies and allies. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter, reducing cooldown and improves cast point.

abilities.name: False Promise
abilities.description: Temporarily alters an ally's destiny, delaying any healing or damage taken until False Promise ends. Any healing that is delayed by False Promise is doubled. Removes most negative status effects and disables on initial cast.

abilities.name: Land Mines
abilities.description: Plant an invisible mine that explodes when an enemy steps near. The explosion will deal less damage if the enemy is farther away from the mine when it explodes. Mines explode 0.3 seconds after being triggered. Damages buildings.

abilities.name: Stasis Trap
abilities.description: Plant an invisible trap that stuns nearby enemy units when triggered.

abilities.name: Suicide Squad, Attack!
abilities.description: Techies sacrifice themselves for the greater good, dealing massive area of effect damage. More damage is dealt to units closer to Techies when they explode. Techies' respawn time is reduced by 50% when killed by this ability.

abilities.name: Focused Detonate
abilities.description: Detonate all remote mines in the target area.

abilities.name: Minefield Sign
abilities.description: Plant a warning sign to remind enemies to step lightly. Only one sign can exist at a time. Lasts 180 seconds. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter, allowing Minefield Sign to hide any Land Mines, Stasis Traps, and Remote Mines in a 125 radius from True Sight.

abilities.name: Remote Mines
abilities.description: Plant an invisible explosive that will only detonate when triggered. Does not damage buildings. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Berserker's Call
abilities.description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.

abilities.name: Battle Hunger
abilities.description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger.

abilities.name: Counter Helix
abilities.description: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Culling Blade
abilities.description: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, instantly killing an enemy unit with low health, or dealing moderate damage otherwise. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, and Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Meat Hook
abilities.description: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage if it is an enemy. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter, reducing the cooldown and increasing the damage.

abilities.name: Rot
abilities.description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.

abilities.name: Flesh Heap
abilities.description: Gives Pudge resistance to magic damage, as well as bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity. Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.

abilities.name: Dismember
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Pudge gets healed for the same amount he damages. Lasts 3 seconds on Heroes, 6 seconds on creeps.

heroInfo.name: Sand King
heroInfo.bioRoles: Melee - Initiator - Disabler - Nuker - Escape - Jungler

abilities.name: Burrowstrike
abilities.description: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter, increasing the range and applies Caustic Finale to every heroes hit by Burrowstrike. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Sand Storm
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision. The invisibility remains for a short duration after the sandstorm ends.

abilities.name: Caustic Finale
abilities.description: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to violently explode when its timer expires, or when the unit dies, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Deals 50% damage if its timer expires. Caustic Finale is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifier.

abilities.name: Epicenter
abilities.description: CHANNELED - After channeling for 2 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.

heroInfo.name: Slardar
heroInfo.bioRoles: Melee - Carry - Durable - Initiator - Disabler - Escape

abilities.name: Sprint
abilities.description: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units, though becoming more vulnerable to damage.

abilities.name: Slithereen Crush
abilities.description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy land units. After the stun, the affected units are slowed.

abilities.name: Bash
abilities.description: Grants a chance that an attack will do bonus damage and stun an enemy. The duration is doubled against creeps.

abilities.name: Amplify Damage
abilities.description: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility.

abilities.name: Gush
abilities.description: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor. Lasts 4 seconds. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter, turning Gush into a ground targeted wave and decreasing cooldown.

abilities.name: Kraken Shell
abilities.description: Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold. Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.

abilities.name: Anchor Smash
abilities.description: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to damage nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.

abilities.name: Ravage
abilities.description: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

heroInfo.name: Wraith King
heroInfo.bioRoles: Melee - Carry - Support - Durable - Disabler - Initiator

abilities.name: Wraithfire Blast
abilities.description: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.

abilities.name: Vampiric Aura
abilities.description: Nearby friendly units restore health based on the damage they deal when attacking enemy units.

abilities.name: Mortal Strike
abilities.description: Wraith King passively gains a chance to deal bonus damage on an attack.

abilities.name: Reincarnation
abilities.description: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle. Upon death, enemy units in a 900 radius will be slowed. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

heroInfo.name: Lifestealer
heroInfo.bioRoles: Melee - Carry - Durable - Jungler - Escape - Disabler

abilities.name: Rage
abilities.description: Launch into a maddened rage, becoming Spell Immune, 100% resistant to magic damage, and gaining increased attack speed.

abilities.name: Feast
abilities.description: Lifestealer's attacks damage enemies and heal himself for a percentage of his target's current health.

abilities.name: Open Wounds
abilities.description: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration.

abilities.name: Assimilate
abilities.description: Lifestealer swallows an allied hero, allowing them to hide within him. Any healing Lifestealer receives is shared with the hero within. When an assimilated hero leaves Lifestealer, they erupt outward, damaging nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Eject
abilities.description: Ejects an Assimilated hero, damaging nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Infest
abilities.description: Lifestealer infests the body of a target unit, becoming undetectable inside. He can then explode from the host body, dealing damage to nearby enemies. If the infested unit is an enemy creep or a neutral creep, he can take control of the unit's ability to move and attack, and when consumed the creep will heal Lifestealer's health equal to the creep's current health. Does not work on enemy heroes. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Control
abilities.description: Lifestealer seizes control of the host body's nervous system, allowing him to issue movement and attack orders from within. Controlled units share Lifestealer's movement speed. Cannot be used on heroes.

abilities.name: Consume
abilities.description: Lifestealer eats the host body from the inside out, exploding from within.

heroInfo.name: Night Stalker
heroInfo.bioRoles: Melee - Carry - Initiator - Durable - Disabler - Nuker

abilities.name: Void
abilities.description: Creates a damaging void that slows an enemy unit and deals damage. Void also mini-stuns, interrupting channeling abilities. The slowing effect lasts longer at night.

abilities.name: Crippling Fear
abilities.description: Night Stalker horrifies the target enemy Hero, causing it to miss attacks and become silenced. The effect lasts longer at night.

abilities.name: Hunter in the Night
abilities.description: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness.

abilities.name: Darkness
abilities.description: Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. While Darkness is in effect, enemy heroes, units, wards and buildings have their vision range reduced to 675. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

heroInfo.name: Doom
heroInfo.bioRoles: Melee - Carry - Disabler - Initiator - Durable - Nuker

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed.

abilities.name: Scorched Earth
abilities.description: Carpets the nearby earth in flames which damage enemies and heal Doom, while also granting him increased movement speed.

abilities.name: Infernal Blade
abilities.description: Doom swings his burning sword, igniting the enemy. Stuns for 0.3 seconds and applies a 4 second burn that deals 40 + 1.25% of the target's Max HP as damage per second.

abilities.name: Doom
abilities.description: Inflicts a curse that prevents an enemy Hero from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

heroInfo.name: Spirit Breaker
heroInfo.bioRoles: Melee - Carry - Initiator - Disabler - Durable - Escape

abilities.name: Charge of Darkness
abilities.description: Spirit Breaker fixes his sight on an enemy unit and starts charging through all objects. All enemy units passed through and the targeted unit will be hit by a Greater Bash. If the targeted unit dies, Spirit Breaker will change his target to the nearest enemy unit to that location.

abilities.name: Empowering Haste
abilities.description: Causes Spirit Breaker to gain power with higher movement speed. His presence increases the movement speed of nearby allied units. Can be cast to improve the movement speed bonus for 6 seconds, however afterward the passive bonus will be halved while the ability is on cooldown.

abilities.name: Greater Bash
abilities.description: Gives a chance to stun and knockback an enemy unit on an attack, as well as gaining bonus movement speed after a bash occurs. Deals a percentage of movement speed as damage.

abilities.name: Nether Strike
abilities.description: Spirit Breaker slips into the nether realm, reappearing next to his hapless victim. Upon reappearing, a Greater Bash of the current level occurs and deals bonus damage. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

heroInfo.name: Lycan
heroInfo.bioRoles: Melee - Carry - Pusher - Jungler - Durable - Escape

abilities.name: Summon Wolves
abilities.description: Summons two wolves to fight for Lycan. Level 2-4 wolves have Cripple, level 3-4 wolves have permanent invisibility, and level 4 wolves have 15 HP regen.

abilities.name: Howl
abilities.description: Grants bonus damage to Lycan, all allied heroes and all units under their control.

abilities.name: Feral Impulse
abilities.description: Increases the damage and attack speed of Lycan and all units under his control.

abilities.name: Shapeshift
abilities.description: Lycan assumes his lupine form, granting him and his units critical strikes and added vision at night. During Shapeshift, Lycan and all units under his control move at increased speed, cannot be slowed and have a 40% chance to deal a critical strike doing 140% damage.

heroInfo.name: Chaos Knight
heroInfo.bioRoles: Melee - Carry - Disabler - Durable - Pusher - Initiator

abilities.name: Chaos Bolt
abilities.description: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.

abilities.name: Reality Rift
abilities.description: Teleports you, any images you have and the target unit to a random point along the line between the two of you. Gives you bonus attack damage for one attack.

abilities.name: Chaos Strike
abilities.description: Each of Chaos Knight's attacks has a chance to deal bonus damage and reduce the target's armor by 5 for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Phantasm
abilities.description: Summons several phantasmal copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. There is a 50% chance an extra phantasm will be summoned. The phantasms deal full damage, but take double damage.

abilities.name: Decay
abilities.description: Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter, increasing Decay's strength steal.

abilities.name: Soul Rip
abilities.description: Undying rips health away from all nearby units and uses it to heal an ally, or damage an enemy. Soul Rip can also be used to heal Tombstone.

abilities.name: Tombstone
abilities.description: Summons a tombstone at the target point. Zombies will frequently spawn next to every enemy unit in the area around the Tombstone, and attack them. Zombies have the Deathlust ability, which causes their attacks to slow the target, and if the target reaches below a certain amount of health, increases the attack and movement speed of the zombie.

abilities.name: Flesh Golem
abilities.description: Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem that possesses a Plague Aura. This aura slows all enemy units within 750 range and amplifies the damage they take; the closer to Undying, the more damage and slow. When a plagued unit dies, Undying is healed equal to a percentage of his own maximum health.

abilities.name: Shockwave
abilities.description: Magnus sends out a wave of force, damaging enemy units in a line.

abilities.name: Empower
abilities.description: Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter, changing Empower to be an allied hero aura. Affects ranged heroes for half values and causes them to splash around the target. Can still be cast on units, but doesn't stack.

abilities.name: Skewer
abilities.description: Magnus rushes forward, goring enemy units on his massive tusk. Heroes hit on the way will be dragged to the destination, then damaged and slowed.

abilities.name: Reverse Polarity
abilities.description: Magnus changes properties of matter, sucking all nearby enemies in front of him and stunning them with a powerful slam and dealing damage. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Mist Coil
abilities.description: Abaddon releases a coil of deathly mist that can damage an enemy unit or heal a friendly unit at the cost of some of Abaddon's health.

abilities.name: Aphotic Shield
abilities.description: Summons dark energies around an ally unit, creating a shield that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the shield is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it. Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast.

abilities.name: Curse of Avernus
abilities.description: Abaddon strikes an enemy with chilling curse on each attack, causing all units who attack the slowed enemy to gain increased movement speed, along with faster attack speed, for a limited time.

abilities.name: Borrowed Time
abilities.description: When activated, all damage dealt to you will heal instead of harm. Most negative buffs will also be removed. If the ability is not on cooldown, it will automatically activate if your health falls below 400. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

heroInfo.name: Bloodseeker
heroInfo.bioRoles: Melee - Carry - Disabler - Jungler - Nuker - Initiator

abilities.name: Bloodrage
abilities.description: Drives a unit into a bloodthirsty rage during which a unit deals, and takes, increased damage. Units affected by Bloodrage will be healed for a percentage of the max health of any units they kill. Units affected by Bloodrage when killed will heal a percentage of their max health to their killer.

abilities.name: Blood Rite
abilities.description: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After 3 seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.

abilities.name: Thirst
abilities.description: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, gaining bonus movement speed and attack damage whenever an enemy hero's health falls below 75%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below 25%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero.

abilities.name: Rupture
abilities.description: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture. If the unit moves, it takes a percentage of the distance traveled as damage. The damage is dealt through spell immunity. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Shadowraze
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend razes the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in an area.

abilities.name: Necromastery
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. If the killed unit is a hero, he gains 12 souls. On death, he releases half of them from bondage. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter, increasing Necromastery Max Souls to 22.
